name: Evan Nicholas
description: I am easygoing personality. I’m extremely optimistic and I have a good sense of humor. I rarely get angry or bent out of shape over things because life is just too awesome to worry about the little bumps in the road. I love intelligent conversation. When I’m with the right person, I can talk until the wee hours of the morning. I love the afterglow of a good conversation with someone I care about and if want a chat wt me you can add me my emial below evannicholas564@yahoo.com or send my a text on my mobile number +2034914576
